name: Note-Taking API
description: API documentation for the Note-Taking backend application
title: Note-Taking API Documentation

header.title: Introduction
header.content:
Note-Taking API

This documentation provides details about the endpoints available in the Note-Taking API.

The API features user authentication, note management with versioning, concurrency control, and full-text search.

footer.title: Additional Information
footer.content:
Authentication

Most endpoints require authentication via a Bearer JWT token in the Authorization header.

Errors

The API returns standard HTTP status codes with JSON error messages.
